title: Public Holidays (Declaration) Notice, 2018
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 335
Gazette dated Tuesday, 6th March, 2018
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.15 OF2018
The Public Holidays Act
(Laws,Volume15,Cap.272)
The Public Holidays (Declaration) Notice, 2018
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 3 of the Public
HolidaysAct,thefollowingNoticeisissued:
1. This Notice may be cited as the Public Holidays Title
(Declaration)Notice,2018.
2. ItisdeclaredthatFriday,9thMarch,2018,shallbeobserved Declaration
as public holiday in view of the fact that International Womenâ€™s ofpublic
holiday
Day which falls on Thursday, 8th March, 2018, and Youth Day
which falls on Monday, 12th March, 2018, are public holidays
respectively.
EDGARC.LUNGU,
LUSAKA President
